translations: n．散步道，漫步区：供人们散步、休闲的宽阔道路或区域。

sentences.sentence: She had become inquisitive; and so she entered into conversation directly with the strange gentleman, on their promenades.
sentences.translation: 她变得有些好奇；于是她就和这位陌生的绅士在散步场直接聊了起来起来。

sentences.sentence: Promenades. Baroque customs spire, one looked very Europeanized. Beautiful.
sentences.translation: 长廊。巴洛克风俗尖顶，一眼望去，十分欧化。

sentences.sentence: A series of botanical courts extend along the western water garden echoing the form and proportion of the promenades.
sentences.translation: 一系列的植物园法院延长沿西部水花园呼应的形式和比例的长廊。
